projectDesc.p: This document is part of a wider project to make the contents of Town, a collection of poetry and photography by Annemarie Ní Churreáin and Rich Gilligan, available as TEI-compliant machine-readable texts. The transcription and encoding of these materials has been undertaken with the kind permission of Jamie Murphy, who imprint The Salvage Press, published the original printed editions of Town in 2018.

lg.l: and the boy dreams the wet
and soon the field around him will inflate
like a bud beneath a stranger's kiss.

l.hi: Let us go out to the field,

lg.l: Beyond the bridge, a kinglet with a steely eye
tucks a feather back into place
For those already in the earth
